item.description:
Buonasera a tutti...


Thank you for all of your interest in Sunday's events....and in joining me and my Italian students


Here below is the updated list of the 30+ attendees (including some of you) that are participating in this Sunday's Lunch (@ Pasta Beach - Rowes Wharf, Boston) and the Italian Movie 'Habemus Papam' (@ Caffè Paradiso - Hanover Street)...


To see the full details of the event (including the great menu that we will be served for lunch, go to the 'Events' page of my website:


http://italianprogram.com/Event.html


The lunch begins at 1:00 @ Pasta Beach, and they can accommodate up to 40-50 people.
Lunch will consist of being served 3 different types of appetizers, 2 pasta dishes e 2 entrees and 1 side dish.  We will all have a chance to try everything.


The movie 'Habemus Papam' will be shown twice.  The 1st showing will begin before lunch (11:00-12:30) and the 2nd showing will begin after lunch (3:00-4:30).  We can accommodate up to 20-25 people at Caffè Paradiso for the movie.


Here is a link to the youtube trailer for the film:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8VqNoLzZRkI

The movie at Caffè Paradiso will include either a cappuccino/latte/cioccolata, OR an espresso/coffee/tea + a mini-dessert (cannolo or biscotto).


Many of you are on this list below, but if you are not, please feel free to contact me if you'd like to join us.  There is room for about 10-15 more people   (5-7 at each of the 2 movie showings).


Please check the list below to see that your name is on it, and if the group that I added you to matches what you had requested.


GROUP 1 - 11:00 (movie) and 1:00 (lunch)


Dawn A.

Carol M.

Deborah H.

Flaviano D.

Jeffrey O. + guest

Jill K.

John J.

Karina D.

Kim C.

Leah R. + guest

Micheal V.

Rita L.

Sarah M.

Steve A. + guest

Yesenia F. + guest


GROUP 2 -  1:00 (lunch) and 3:00 (movie)
Anthony T.

Carlo P.

Gail B. + guest

Iskra P.

Jean C.  + guest

John J.

Katy G. + guest

Laura D'A. + guest

Laurie M.

Lisa D.

Michael D. + guest

Paul A.

Sonia S.


If anyone else receiving this email/invitation would like to join us, please contact me first by email and/or by phone (617) 233-9876.  I will then instruct you on how to pay for the event in advance to hold a spot.


Despite today's bad weather, Sunday is looking great...with sunny skies and temps near 50.  Sunday is also an easy day for parking on the streets of downtown and on Hanover Street in the North End...where it is free and unlimited until 6:00 pm.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ciao a tutti...

A fun day is being planned for you.  You will be treated to a complete family-style meal at Pasta Beach at Rowes Wharf (http://www.pastabeachrestaurants.com/index.php/menu-fall-winter-2012) and you will view the movie 'Habemus Papam' (We have a Pope) (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1456472/) at Caffè Paradiso in the North End.

Can anyone guess why I am choosing this particular movie at this particular time?

 

DATE: Sunday, March 10

 

EVENT #1 - (Family-style 3-course lunch)

Time: 1:00 pm

Place: Pasta Beach

Address: 30 Rowes Wharf, Boston

 

**THE ENTIRE MENU OF WHAT WE WILL BE EATING CAN BE SEEN ON THE EVENTS PAGE OF MY WEBSITE AT:  http://italianprogram.com/Menu_Pasta_Beach.html

 

EVENT #2 - (Movie - 'Habemus Papam' (We have a Pope)

Time: 11:00 am* OR 3:00 pm **

Place: Caffè Paradiso (in the classroom/projection room)

Address: 255 Hanover Street

* cappuccino/latte/cioccolata included with the 11:00 am showing

**coffee/espresso/tea + mini-cannolo or biscotto included with the 3:00 pm showing

Whether or not you choose to vies the movie at 11:00 or 3:00, but both groups will meet at Pasta Beach at 1:00 for lunch.  You basically will have a choice to view the movie before lunch or after lunch.

TOTAL COST FOR THE LUNCH, MOVIE, coffee and dessert - $37

PAYMENT MUST BE MADE IN ADVANCE USING PAYPAL ON THE EVENTS PAGE OF MY WEBSITE: (ITALIANPROGRAM.COM)

Go to: italianprogam.com and then click on the 'Events' page to find the Paypal option at the bottom of the page.

If interested in attending, just reply to this posting AND email me directly at italianprogram@gmail.com.  I will need your full name, email address and cell phone number.

If possible, choose a time that you would prefer to view the movie....at 11:00 am or at 3:00 pm, and I will begin to create a spreadsheet with that information.

Call me at 617-233-9876 if needed.

John

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: Family-Style Lunch @ 'Pasta Beach' + Movie - 'Habemus Papam' (We have a Pope)
